spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. Door placement is consistent with the blueprint layout. Some scaling issues with window sizing and minor spacing in the laundry/bathroom corridor.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. No text labels or measurement lines. Roof is removed, all rooms are present, and the model is floating on a dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Block-style furniture is localized correctly. Points deducted for the dining table being rotated 90 degrees compared to the 2D plan and the kitchen island appearing slightly oversized.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style. Lighting is soft and ambient. The camera is isometric, though slightly lower in pitch than a standard 45-degree angle.

detected_errors.description: Dining table orientation is rotated 90 degrees relative to 2D plan.
Camera angle is slightly shallower than the strict 45-degree isometric standard.
